item.title: About
item.description: My name is Stas and I am a software developer. I am going to share my daily routines. By the way, It helps me to better remember information when I explain it to someone. Probably you will find some articles useful for your case. I would like to sorry about my English in advance. It’s not my native language :) My Contacts: LinkedIn GitHub Email So, there you have it… enjoy!
